courses.description:
The Expert Masterclass shows you how to take ALL your KNOWLEDGE, EXPERIENCE, INFORMATION AND ADVICE and position it, package it and promote it in such a way that you become widely known as an EXPERT and not just that – but a HIGHLY PAID expert.
This course was created by Nisandeh Neta, a multimillionaire marketing expert that has cooperated with world class experts such us Sir Richard Branson, Brian Tracy, Jay Abraham and Rich Schefren.
Important: Nisandeh is answering questions almost daily to help you keep growing your business.
In order to be able to create more impact and charge more while doing it, you need to establish an expert position. Once this is done, you will be able to make more money, charge higher prices, and get better clients, more publicity & business opportunities.
Simply put, once you establish yourself as an expert, business becomes easier and you can focus on what you love more: creating an impact in people's lives.
This course, which was given during live events to 21000 participants, has been edited in order to be suitable for online learning, and it will take you step by step through the process you need to follow in order to position yourself as an expert by explaining:
How to align your business with your life so that you can grow your business faster
How to unlock your expertise's full potential, in order to be able to help more clients
The expert business model and the 3 paths to becoming an expert
How to succeed by partnering with other experts
How to turn prospects into buyers using a simple strategy
How to build your credibility as an expert
The Grand Plan

Becoming and being perceived as an expert is one of the most effective ways to grow your business and Nisandeh will guide you through the process.
target_audience: Coaches that want to be paid as experts while helping people improve their lives or business
Coaches that feel that they are overworked and underpaid
Coaches that want to establish themselves as the go-to person in their field

requirements: It's helpful, but not necessary, to take the earlier course "How to Launch a Lucrative Car Sales Career"
If you have been in the car sales business for a year or more, you will quickly recognize the situations detailed in this course and discover the solutions you have been looking for.
If you have any kind of "sales" experience, i.e., dealing with customers, you will be somewhat equipped to consider a career in car sales. That would be an initial starting point.
courses.description:
This course is about succeeding in car sales, whether you are new to the business or just realizing that you need professional guidance to become a Master.
Are you looking to take your car sales career to the next level? Do you want to become a top performer in the industry and achieve long-term success? You have come to the right place.
During this course, I will personally guide you through every step of the process, from prospecting to meeting and greeting clients in the showroom, handling objections, closing the sale, and following up for referrals and repeat sales. These 50 steps left no stone unturned. You will get a deep understanding along with the specific word tracks needed for most every situation you will encounter.
Throughout the course, you will have access to a wide range of resources including video lectures, quizzes, interactive exercises, tracking forms to document your progress, and real-world situations and examples to help you apply the concepts you are learning.
By the end of this course, you will have the knowledge and skills needed to excel in the car sales industry and achieve your career goals, whether those goals include a higher income than you ever thought possible or an army of raving fans and supporters.
When I got into the car sales business over 15 years ago (following a traditional consumer goods marketing career), it was already clear that the industry was starting to change and the “old school” techniques that car salespeople had been using for literally 100 years were no longer effective in the emerging world of maximizing “customer experience” while still closing a high ratio of prospects.
This course covers all the critical things I learned as I brought my marketing education and skills to the personal selling game of car sales and created a New Way to Sell Cars using social media, video, and a unique follow-up system. I quickly figured out that to be successful, I had to develop a continuous flow of customers who were pre-qualified and pre-conditioned to buy. The successful old-school professionals did this over decades of building a network of past clients that they kept in touch with. But I didn’t have decades.
I needed to figure out how to leapfrog my colleagues and get people to come to the dealership and ask for me. Great sales skills are important, but you also need a steady stream of prospects that are already receptive to your message. That’s where Marketing comes in, and that’s where I knew I could create an advantage where most of my colleagues (and most of your colleagues) come up short.
I was able to master the current digital communications tools to generate my own store traffic and build a successful car sales career. I spent a decade perfecting these systems, but you can leapfrog that trial-and-error grief by tapping into the methods I will share with you in this course.
Gordon N. Wright
target_audience: Anyone who has joined a dealership within the past 6 to 12 months in a sales role will get the most benefit from this introductory/intermediate level course.
If you are a sales manager at a car dealership, this course will be a great blueprint to use in training your sales team and establishing a set of best practices.

Im ersten Schritt zeige ich dir erfolgreiche Strategien, wie du mehr Besucher auf deine Website bekommst. Besonders achten wir darauf, dass du aus jedem einzelnen Website-Besucher, möglichst großen Nutzen für dein Business zeihen kannst. Hier gebe ich dir viele Tipps und ToDos an die Hand, dank derer du deinen Verkaufskanal optimieren kannst.

courses.description:
Qui n'a jamais rêvé d'avoir un assistant disponible 24h/24 pour nous aider dans toutes nos tâches marketing ? Quelqu'un capable de créer des publicités (Google ou Facebook), trouver des mots clés pour sa stratégie SEO, des idées d'articles, rédiger des articles entier, traduire son site web, créer un plan de site et même créer de A à Z une stratégie pour nos réseaux sociaux avec un planning éditorial précis.
Cet assistant, OpenAI l'a créé et il se nomme ChatGPT.
Vous en avez certainement déjà entendu parlé ! Grâce à cette formation vous allez découvrir précisément comment ChatGPT a changé mon métier de webmarketers. Non, ChatGPT ne me remplacera pas, il va m'aider à apporter plus de valeurs à mes clients.
Bien entendu, vous qui allez apprendre à maîtriser cet outil, vous allez optimiser votre temps et votre budget marketing.
Voici ce sur quoi ChatGPT va vous aider (grâce à la formation) :
Le SEO (référencement naturel)
La création de site web
Lancer des campagnes Google Ads
Lancer des campagnes Facebook Ads
Gérer vos réseaux sociaux
Créer vos postes sur vos réseaux sociaux
Rédiger des articles de blog
Créer des MasterSpins
Et plus bien encore
Le but de la formation est deveniez autonome avec ChatGPT et que vous puissiez l'utiliser par vous même car les possibilités sont tout simplement INFINIES.
Un mot à propos de l'auteur :
Je suis consultant SEO depuis 10 ans  maintenant. J'aide mes clients à mettre en place des stratégies d'acquisition de trafic, de leads ou de clients ROIstes. J'utilise pour cela plusieurs leviers : réseaux sociaux, publicités en ligne, SEA et le plus souvent, le référencement naturel qui est le levier le plus intéressant sur le long terme. Je peux aller plus en loin en accompagnant mes clients dans la mise en place d'une stratégie d'Inbound marketing et de marketing automation.
J'ai travaillé pour des entreprises de toute tailles, beaucoup de PME, startups et sites ecommerce. J'ai notamment une certaine expertise dans le secteur BtoB des nouvelles technologies.
Je vous dis à tout de suite de l'autre côté !

JOIN OVER 1,400 SUCCESSFUL STUDENTS USING MY 7 STEP STRATEGY TO DRIVE HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS OF VISITORS TO YOUR WEBSITE, EVEN IF IT IS BRAND NEW, WITH ZERO SEO SKILLS!


Here's my promise: You will make your money back on this course in just 2 weeks! No BS!
In January 2014, I started an eCommerce business with zero SEO experience. I knew I needed immediate traffic and sales to earn money in order to reinvest. I decided to take a completely non-convention route, and started selling 5 figures a month without any advertising budget or traffic from Google. So far this year, I have sold nearly $85,000 through unconventional strategies discussed in this course.
UPDATE: I ENDED 2014 WITH JUST SHY OF $100,000 IN TOTAL SALES!
This course provides a detailed strategy on driving traffic to your new website without a large advertising budget or SEO experience, and then how to convert that traffic in sales. You do not need ANY technical background to take this course, as the techniques discussed are for people just getting started in eCommerce.
I've shared these tips with many other successful eCommerce entrepreneurs, and based on the success others have seen, decided that there is great value in sharing the strategy. From taking this course, you WILL create many streams of traffic to your website WITHOUT spending lots of money on advertising.
I enjoy engaging with all students who take this course, and bouncing ideas off other Internet Marketers. If you sign up for this course, you can communicate with me whenever you'd like 1:1. If there are topics that you'd like for me to discuss on this course that aren't currently included, please let me know so I can put together a lecture series!

objectives: A deep dive into what ChatGPT is, its capabilities, and how it can be used to automate and enhance your email writing process.
Detailed instructions on how to use ChatGPT, from setting it up to effectively leveraging its features.

The Basics of Using ChatGPT for Copywriting
Advanced Techniques for ChatGPT: Making ChatGPT Write like a Human
Tips for Troubleshooting and Optimizing AI Output

requirements: Basic Computer Literacy: As the course would be primarily based on using a software tool (ChatGPT), students should have basic computer skills and be comfortable using software and internet-based tools.
Understanding of Email Communication: A fundamental understanding of how email communication works, including knowledge about the structure and etiquette of professional emails.

Basic Marketing Knowledge: An understanding of basic marketing principles, particularly those related to direct email marketing, could be beneficial to understand the strategies and tactics that will be covered.
Writing Skills: While not a strict requirement, having a basic proficiency in English writing will be useful to better comprehend the concepts related to writing persuasive and effective emails.
courses.description:
Welcome to a revolutionary journey in the realm of AI-enhanced communication! Our course, "Crafting Cold Emails With ChatGPT", is designed for anyone seeking to harness the power of AI in their email marketing strategies. It's a journey that will take you from understanding the basics of cold emailing, through mastering the art of creating compelling, AI-assisted prompts, to troubleshooting and refining your efforts to perfection.
The course begins with an overview of ChatGPT, setting the stage for both novices and experienced users. It moves forward to cover the foundational principles of effective cold email copywriting, giving learners an understanding of the underlying strategy before diving into the usage of ChatGPT.
One of the key aspects we delve into is the importance of identifying and articulating buyer and seller personas. With the aid of ChatGPT, we'll show how understanding these personas can lead to the creation of more personalized and effective emails.
We then tackle the art and science of prompt creation, sharing strategies on how to use prompts effectively, from defining personas, through detailing the focus of each email, to defining the call to action and tonality. You'll learn how to make ChatGPT generate copy that feels genuinely human.
The course culminates with a hands-on live demo, where I troubleshoot and refine prompts with ChatGPT, demonstrating how to persistently work towards the desired output. "Crafting Cold Emails With ChatGPT" isn't just a course; it's a journey into the future of cold emailing. Join us, and let's conquer the world of cold email prompts together!
target_audience: Marketing Professionals: This course is perfect for marketers who are looking to enhance their email outreach strategy and increase their conversion rates.
Sales Professionals: Sales representatives and managers can use the skills taught in this course to craft persuasive introductory emails to potential clients.

Entrepreneurs and Small Business Owners: For those running their own business, effective email communication can be a powerful tool for gaining new clients and maintaining relationships with existing ones.
Freelancers: Professionals such as freelance writers, graphic designers, or consultants who need to reach out to potential clients can greatly benefit from mastering the art of crafting cold emails.
Job Seekers: Individuals looking for employment opportunities could use the skills taught in this course to write effective cold emails to potential employers.

Anyone interested in AI and Writing: Lastly, anyone with a keen interest in the intersection of artificial intelligence and writing, looking to understand how AI like ChatGPT can enhance their writing process.

requirements: You do not need any specific skills, although having some marketing, product management, or business experience may help you see how you can more quickly implement what you learn in your daily work.
courses.description:
Stop chasing the next shiny tactics that never seem to work for your business
Learn growth marketing from a tech CEO and startup coach who's launched multi-million-dollar products
Many people believe that to get more leads, grow revenue, or increase retention, you need to have some sort of magic powers. But it doesn't have to be this way.
There is a simple data-driven process that you can follow. Instead of guessing, you'll be able to generate results more consistently.
Mastering those skills has the potential to radically change the course of your career or business.
This course will teach you the fundamentals of growth marketing. It will give you the tools and knowledge to start running growth experiments that bring new customers, improve their experience, and increase retention.
Most importantly, it will completely change how you think about customer acquisition, monetization, and retention.


By the end of this comprehensive video course, you’ll be able to:
Identify growth opportunities using Pirate Metrics
Manage the growth hacking process with a team
Analyze and identify opportunities to optimize your marketing funnels
Ideate and prioritize growth ideas using the ICE model
Set hypotheses and measure experiment results
Design and run statistically significant experiments with Google Optimize
Select three simple tech stack options that you can set up right away
Build a solid plan to win and keep more customers with a variety of growth strategies
Develop growth mindset that doesn’t involve tricking people into buying your product.


This is not Netflix. You’ll learn by doing.
This course is not another show that you can mindlessly watch on Netflix. No. This is for those who want to put in the work, get better, practice what they learn, and become top-notch growth marketers.
This course is comprehensive and easy to follow: it has everything you need to get started right away.
Step-by-step growth hacking methodology
Action-focused assignment
14 how-to guides to set up specific tools
5 ready-to-use templates (North Star definition, ICE prioritization, Funnel Analysis, Idea Backlog, Experiment Sheets)
25 tactics to grow your audience and win new customers
Real-life case studies
Applying what you'll learn will change how you see growth and, most importantly, give you the secret to unlocking growth opportunities wherever you work and in any type of business.


Join me in the course today. Enroll now to start learning some of the most-in-demand digital skills that will boost your career and business.

courses.description:
【はじめに】
こんにちは、講師のしゅうです。


薬剤師やめてコンテンツビジネスでご飯食べています。


個人起業家として、僕はこれまで累計202人以上の相談にのってきました。


有難いことに、自分の講座を持ったり、オンライン教材の販売ができるようになったりなど、ご自身のビジネスを構築したコンサル受講生の実績が多数あります。


また、マーケティングやコンテンツビジネスの知見から、商品設計・プロモ構築を依頼され1社受託しています。


これからも、みなさんにオンラインビジネスのサポートを提供し、共に成長していきたいと考えています。


このコースでは「X(Twitter)とYouTube動画を使ったクロスメディアで、濃い見込み顧客を集客する方法」について解説します。



【このコースの概要説明】
このコースを受講いただくと、X(Twitter)とYouTube動画を使って、濃い見込み顧客を集客できるようになります。

また、X(Twitter)アカウントの作成方法や、ポスト作成、YouTube動画コンテンツの作り方、クロスメディア戦略の具体的な方法など、質の高い集客力UPの方法をマスターできます。


もう今のX(Twitter)では、戦略なく運用しても無駄な労力となります。


フォロワー数、インプ数など全てが水の泡になります。

ゆえに


「どうすればいいんだろ...そもそも、後発組で参入して大丈夫かな？」


と思われるX(Twitter)ですが、信頼を愚直に獲得するクロスメディア戦略であれば勝ち筋があります。


現代で圧倒的に強い動画の力を使わないのは非常に勿体無いです。


「フォロワー数、アルゴリズム、インフルエンサーなどの拡散に頼らない」


次世代のX(Twitter)マーケティングとして、YouTube動画と掛け合わせたクロスメディア戦略を伝えていきます。




【コースを受講することで…】
◆濃い見込み顧客を集客できる
◆一過性ではなく継続した集客ができる
◆疲弊しないSNSビジネスを構築できる
◆持続可能なマーケティングを取得できる
◆持続的で強力なファンビジネスを実現できる
◆信頼関係を構築した息の長いビジネスができる
◆ファン化できるYouTube動画コンテンツが作れる
◆オーガニック集客で安定した集客を確立できる
◆労働的なX(Twitter)運用から抜け出すことができる
◆後発組でも勝てるX(Twitter)アカウントを作成できる




【こんな方が受講に向いています】
・毎月の集客数が安定しない
・X(Twitter)運用に疲弊している
・X(Twitter)集客しているけど、苦しい
・集客ができなくて売上が減って困っている
・他の競合アカウントに埋もれて見られない
・ポスト作成やコンテンツ作成に自信がない
・X(Twitter)運用を続けているが、見通しが立たない
・毎日メッセージをやり取りする濃いファンが1人もいない
・発信した情報が他のアカウントに埋もれている不安がある
・暴れるような絡みやフォロー周りといった小手先の集客に不安がある
・教材を買っても元々の実績や影響力に依存した強者の戦略ばかりで何をすればいいか分からない




【こんな方は受講に向いていません】
・X(Twitterの)のインプ数を増やしたい
・X(Twitter)のフォロワー数を増やしたい
・ポスト投稿をバズらせたい
・X(Twitter)のアルゴリズムを知りたい
・YouTubeチャンネル登録者数を爆伸びさせたい
・YouTubeSEOを知りたい
・商品作成をしたい
・即収益化したい




【このコースは全部で10セクションです】
●セクション01：はじめに
●セクション02：後発組でも勝てる次世代X(Twitter)マーケティングの全体像
●セクション03：濃い集客が可能なX(Twitter)の土台
●セクション04：フォロワー数に依存しないX(Twitter)運用方法
●セクション05：クロスメディア戦略-YouTubeとX(Twitter)の相乗効果
●セクション06：YouTubeを使った効果的な動画コンテンツ制作方法
●セクション07：X(Twitter)とYouTube動画のクロス連携術
●セクション08：SNSクロスメディア戦略のその先へ
●セクション09：まとめ
●セクション10：ボーナスレクチャー


全部で4時間54分のコースです。


その他、必要に応じてワークシートが用意されています。


ワークシートに沿って実践していただくことで、クロスメディア戦略の構築による、濃い見込み顧客の集客ができます。




【さいごに】
本コースに興味を持っていただいた方は、「コース登録」へお進みください。


もう少し検討したい方は、プレビューで講座の一部が動画で見れますので、ぜひ覗いてみてください。


それでは、コースの中でお会いできることを楽しみにしています！
target_audience: X(Twitter)で薄い集客ではなく、濃い集客したい人
X(Twitter)集客しているけど、苦しくて疲弊してる人
他の競合アカウントに埋もれないよう差別化したい人
フォロワー数が少ない状態でもX(Twitter)で集客を実現したい人
一過性のテクニックではなく、発信コンテンツの実力をつけたい人
X(Twitter)とYouTubeを掛け合わせることで持続的で強力なファンビジネスを実現したい人

courses.bio: 从0-1搭建私域全链路流量池
objectives: 1.了解零售企业消费市场的变化
2.掌握建立私域的核心目标
3.理解私域业务价值公式
4.掌握消费品私域运营的特征

课程内容: 1.零售企业消费市场新变化新机会？
2.私域有哪些业务价值？如何评估？
4.消费零售企业如何做自身私域定位（上）？
5.消费零售企业如何做自身私域定位（下）？
6.消费零售企业如何搭建私域全链路流量池
7.承接引流环节，如何选钩子品？
8.留存互动环节，如何选传播品？

10.转化推荐环节，如何选利润品？

requirements: 有一定运营增长工作经验
courses.description:
一场突如其来的疫情，把社群（微信群）卖货、到家零售推到了一个新的风口。为了控制到店带来的人员接触，疫情爆发以来，包括零售企业和部分餐饮企业在内，有越来越多的零售企业更加重视社群零售（微信群卖货），店+群将会成为越来越多零售企业的标准配置。从传统营销的角度讲，用户信任、用户关系是非常重要的。从当前的私域流量角度讲，企业可以借助当前微信群发挥出来的建立用户链接的重点作用，抓住当前的关键时间节点，更好的做好重点用户服务，针对当前特殊时期的用户需求，形成更紧密的用户信任，形成更好的用户关系，形成更好的用户依赖。本次课程，李明轩老师将会从多角度来对零售企业的私域运营进行分析，帮助零售企业领导者经营好自己的私域。
本节课程是由授课老师与三节课合作制作的。在此，要特别感谢老师的辛苦付出！经历了课程立项、设计、开发中的众多环节，我们才能最终为你呈现现在的这门课程。无论是授课老师还是三节课团队，都希望这门课程能够让你有所收获，希望同学们结合个人工作情况，学以致用。
本课程版权归三节课所有，未经书面同意私自录制、转载等行为均属侵权行为。课程内的所有内容，包括但不限于视频、文字、图片均由三节课公司或其他权利人依法拥有其知识产权，包括但不限于著作权、商标权、专利权等。未经三节课公司的明确书面特别授权，任何人不得为任何目的使用以及向任何自然人或单位提供出售、营销、出版或利用三节课官网上提供的任何内容或服务。如有违反，您将承担由此给三节课公司或其他权利人造成的一切损失。
target_audience: 1.寻求通过私域运营破解增长难题的运营人
2.寻求私域流量池搭建方法、系统优化私域运营策略的业务负责人
3.想要进行私域转型的传统企业从业者

courses.description:
You will learn the complete Microsoft Power BI in this curse. You will learn how to build beautiful data visualizations from scratch with Power BI Desktop. You will be good at cleaning and transforming data in Power Query, leveraging powerful Data Modeling techniques and designing Reports & Dashboards. We also dive into Power BI Service and learn how to publish, share and edit our reports from there too!  You will also learn AI Tools to be used in Power BI.
The Microsoft Power BI course is a comprehensive program designed to equip learners with the skills and knowledge necessary to analyze data, derive insights, and make data-driven decisions using one of the most powerful business intelligence tools available today. Power BI, developed by Microsoft, has become a leading platform in data visualization and business analytics, and this course serves as an ideal starting point for professionals, analysts, and students who want to master it from the ground up.
This course begins with an introduction to the Power BI interface and ecosystem, including Power BI Desktop, Power BI Service, and Power BI Mobile. Participants will learn how to connect to a wide range of data sources such as Excel, SQL databases, SharePoint, and cloud-based services. The course emphasizes data preparation and transformation using Power Query Editor, teaching learners how to clean, shape, and model data effectively before it is used for analysis.


What will you learn in this course?


Step by Step Interactive Training from Power BI Basics to Advanced Tools
Be able to automate tasks and stop doing so many things manually
Learn how to Use AI Tools in Power BI
Be able to use Data Modeling and Dashboards to make your life easier
Quickly mastering Power BI to grow your career
You can impress your colleagues or boss with your data modelling skills
Saving hours with work by streamlining analysis with Power BI
Have some Real-World Projects that give you the real world knowledge
Have Power Design Labs where you can practice
You will be more efficient in Power BI so that You will be more marketable for a job or promotion
Analyzing Reports in Power BI Service
target_audience: If you want to learn the complete Microsoft Power BI along with Advanced Dax for Data Analysis , This course is perfect for you!

requirements: You need to be in the Senior Housing industry, preferably in Sales.
courses.description:
If you are new or have been in this industry for awhile, waitlists can be tough to work!  We, as sales professionals, often find that we are waiting for THEM!  It doesn't have to be that way! We can work smarter, not harder, to create a waitlist funnel of prospects or family members that are eager and ready to move forward.
With over a decade of experience, I help demystify the waitlist process, so you can use the waitlist as a way to get commitments on upcoming open homes/units, rather than just waiting on prospects or family to be "ready".  We walk through why the waitlist process can add value to your community, how often to follow up and how to help family members through the emotional journey of change, in supportive and positive ways, so they can feel relief when moving their loved one into your community.  After wrapping this class, you will feel confident in knowing a great way to maximize your waitlist, while following up with intention. Thanks for joining this short 30(ish) minute class!
Tami believes in creating communication and sales processes that empower Senior Citizens or their family members to make positive changes.  Hope you enjoy the class and follow along for more resources!
target_audience: Senior Living organizations, Senior Living communities, Sales and Operations in Senior Housing

courses.description:
Unlock the hidden power of the human brain — and learn how to use it to create marketing that truly converts.


Welcome to Neuromarketing & AI: Influence Consumer Behavior, the complete course that reveals how top brands use neuroscience and artificial intelligence to understand what drives decisions, emotions, and buying behavior.


You’ll go beyond traditional marketing and dive into the science of the mind. Discover how 95% of decisions are made unconsciously, driven by emotion, habit, and cognitive biases — not logic. Learn the brain triggers behind every click, scroll, and purchase, and how companies like Apple, Netflix, and Coca-Cola use these insights to build loyalty and boost sales.


This course is designed for marketers, entrepreneurs, business owners, and creators who want to move from guesswork to strategy. Whether you're launching a product, writing a campaign, or designing a website, you’ll gain practical, science-backed techniques you can apply immediately.


You’ll learn how to:
- Use emotional storytelling that activates the brain like a lived experience
- Apply cognitive biases like scarcity, social proof, and anchoring — ethically and effectively
- Craft high-converting copy with neurocopywriting and power words
- Design websites and ads using eye-tracking principles and visual hierarchy
- Leverage AI tools to analyze emotion, generate persuasive content, and personalize experiences in real time


No prior experience in neuroscience or AI is needed. We start from the basics and build your knowledge step by step. You’ll get actionable templates, real-world case studies, and a downloadable **Neuromarketing + AI Checklist** to guide your campaigns.


We’ll also cover how to measure success — not just clicks, but real behavior change — using heatmaps, A/B testing, and AI analytics, even without a lab.


By the end of this course, you’ll have a complete brain-smart marketing strategy. You’ll know how to influence decisions ethically, create deeper customer connections, and turn science into real-world results.


This isn’t just marketing. It’s influence, engineered.


Join now and be one of the first to master the future of marketing — where brain science meets artificial intelligence.

It’s perfect for:  Digital marketers looking to go beyond traditional tactics and use brain science to boost conversions. Content creators, copywriters, and storytellers who want to write messages that grab attention and inspire action. Small business owners who want to compete with big brands by using smart, science-backed strategies. No prior experience in neuroscience or AI is needed — just a curiosity about how people think and make decisions. Whether you're launching a product, running ads, or building a brand, this course gives you practical, actionable tools to influence behavior ethically and effectively.  If you’ve ever wondered why people say one thing but do another — and want to create marketing that sticks, converts, and makes sense — this course is for you.

courses.description:
Imagine targeting just 100 potential clients—and closing more deals than with 10,000 leads.
That’s Account Based Marketing (ABM).
ABM flips the traditional marketing script. Instead of reaching countless people, it’s about building meaningful, long-term relationships with high-value prospects that drive real revenue.
And the best part? It works. Companies using ABM see up to 78% faster pipeline growth, 74% higher revenue growth, and 70% larger deal sizes.
It’s not about reaching more people—it’s about reaching the right people with the right message at the right time.
WHAT YOU WILL LEARN
ABM Fundamentals: Understand why ABM is a game-changer for B2B marketing and how to get started.
Ideal Customer Profile (ICP) & Target Account List (TAL): Define your perfect customer and build a list of high-value accounts that are most likely to buy from you.
Playbooks & Campaigns: Discover step-by-step ABM playbooks that align Marketing, Sales, and Customer Success to engage and close key accounts faster.
Personalization at Scale: Learn how to personalize outreach for One-to-One, One-to-Few, and One-to-Many ABM campaigns.
Tools & AI: Use modern ABM platforms, LinkedIn Ads, and AI tools to identify buying signals, automate outreach, and scale your campaigns like never before.
Metrics That Matter: Track the KPIs that actually impact your bottom line—pipeline velocity, conversion rates, deal size, and retention.
And SO Much More!
WHAT YOU GET
Lifetime Access: Unlimited access to all course materials.
Expert Insights: Hours of professionally produced lessons covering foundational concepts, advanced tactics, and real-world examples.
Practical Resources: Ready-to-use guides and downloadable files.
Step-by-Step Tutorials: Walkthroughs on building ABM campaigns using tools like LinkedIn Ads, intent data platforms, and CRM integrations.
Real-World Case Studies: See how companies have used ABM to break into Fortune 500 accounts, increase deal sizes, and boost retention.
Continuous Support: Get answers to your questions whenever you need help—we’re invested in your success and we respond 24/7.
30-Day Guarantee: If this course doesn’t exceed your expectations, get a full refund—no questions asked.
This isn’t just theory—it’s a proven framework for building stronger relationships, shortening sales cycles, and closing bigger deals.
Whether you're looking to grow your own business or help your clients do the same, the blueprint is right here.
All you have to do is follow the course step by step.
It's time for you to skyrocket your B2B marketing skills.
So take action and join the course right now.

Analytics : analyser le comportement rée: Heatmap : extraire une tendance de clics, scrolls et mouvements de souris
Recording : visualiser les sessions de visites en replay vidéo
Feedback : intégrer vos utilisateurs dan: Incoming Feedback : Récolter simplement l'avis de vos visiteurs

requirements: Un ordinateur
Une connexion internet
La version Gratuite de Hotjar
Une bonne dose de motivation 😊
Il n’est pas nécessaire d’être UI UX designer, ni d’avoir une expérience dans le domaine.
courses.description:
Hello,
Aujourd’hui, la plupart des sites internet sont développés en se basant sur des suppositions ou un ressenti, une chose qui n’est pas mesurable et qui va différer en fonction de chacun... mais pensez-vous que c'est la meilleure solution ?
Evidemment, vous l’aurez compris c’est une question rhétorique ! Aujourd’hui pour développer un site web performant, qui va atteindre les objectifs fixés, on va se baser sur la Data, le comportement réel du visiteur et ses feedbacks !
Laissez-moi vous présenter Hotjar ! La promesse d’Hotjar est la suivante : Comprenez comment les utilisateurs se comportent sur votre site, ce dont ils ont besoin et ce qu'ils ressentent, rapidement.
A travers cette formation, vous allez apprendre à :
Analyser l’expérience utilisateur à travers des enregistrements vidéos de leur écran pendant la visite sur votre site ou interface web, pour identifier les problèmes et les corriger.
Extraire une tendance globale sur les clics, scrolls et mouvements de souris de vos visiteurs, afin de re structurer votre site en identifier rapidement ce que j’appelle les espaces fantômes : des pages que personnes ne visitent et qui peut-être vous demande énormément de travail.
Confirmer que votre produit ou service correspond bien avec le besoin réel de votre audience à travers un outil de récolte de feedbacks et de questionnaires intégrés à votre site web.
Ça parait presque utopique, et pourtant c’est un outil incontournable pour développer votre activité.
Je m’appelle Rhalid Hidoun, je suis consultant et formateur en marketing digital. Je serais ravi de t’accompagner dans cette aventure et je te dis à tout de suite pour la formation.
Ciao !
target_audience: Débutants et amateurs en design
UX UI Designer, Webdesigner
Startups
Marketer
Développeurs web

courses.description:
In this course, I'll explain the framework that many successful authors have used to drive traffic and engage with their target audience. We'll cover topics like setting up a Facebook group, driving traffic from other groups, creating bait magnets, capturing email addresses, and implementing effective call-to-actions. I'll also discuss how to establish yourself as an authority figure in your niche and drive traffic to your Facebook group. Once you have everything in place, driving traffic and converting your audience into paying customers will become automatic.
The main objective of this course is to generate sales and long-term revenues from your book starting on a zero budget. We'll achieve this by building a branded online community/platform around your book, targeting your ideal readers. Throughout the course, you'll have access to templates, workbooks, and workflows to guide you. The course is divided into four modules, and I recommend completing them in order. Module one focuses on mapping your book to relevant categories and key topics, while module two is about attracting and growing your target audience. These two modules can be completed in about one week. Module three is crucial for converting your audience into paying customers, and it may take around two to three weeks to complete. Finally, module four is a bonus that explores partnerships to set yourself apart from other self-publishing authors. Modules two and three are the ones you'll be focusing on repeatedly, as you continue to grow your audience and convert them into paying customers. Get ready to make progress and achieve your book's success!
target_audience: First-time Self Published Authors: Empower yourself as a first-time self-published author with our comprehensive course designed to navigate the digital marketing landscape efficiently. Whether you're overwhelmed by the myriad of marketing activities or operating on a tight budget, this course equips you with the essential strategies to boost book sales.

Seasoned Self-Published Authors:Learn the art of maximizing revenues from your self-published books, even on a $0 budget. courses.description:
Unlock Explosive Growth with Proven SEO & Social Media Strategies for 2025!


Are you frustrated with marketing that isn’t delivering results? Have you hired freelancers who didn’t drive the traffic or sales you expected? Unsure where to turn next?
This course will guide you step-by-step to develop the most effective marketing strategy for your business, and show you how to implement it to achieve measurable growth in traffic and revenue.


WHY THIS COURSE IS A GAME-CHANGER


The latest SEO tactics for 2025: Learn how to master long-tail keyword research, build cornerstone SEO pages that rank, and apply growth-hacking techniques to make your content soar to the top of search engines.
Real-world case studies: See exactly how different businesses grew to 1,000,000+ users and how my own websites skyrocketed in traffic using these strategies.
Tools & plugins for quick wins: Explore powerful marketing tools like the Weglot translation plugin to instantly boost your rankings across multiple languages.
Tailored guidance for your business: Experiment with multiple growth hacking strategies to find what works best for your unique situation, whether you're an eCommerce brand, a blogger, or a local business.
Join over 18,000 satisfied students who have already used these strategies to grow their businesses!


WHAT YOU'LL GAIN


SEO mastery: Discover how to generate long-term, sustainable traffic by optimizing your website for search engines and creating high-converting SEO pages.
Social media power: Learn how to leverage social media to drive traffic, increase brand awareness, and ultimately boost your SEO. Together, these two approaches will create a snowball effect, accelerating your growth faster than either could alone.
Growth hacking tactics: You’ll experiment with a variety of marketing techniques to pinpoint the ones that will deliver the most significant impact for your business.
WHAT MAKES THIS COURSE STAND OUT


Expert instructor with proven results: As a marketing strategist with over 20 years of experience, I’ve personally helped clients achieve 6 and 7-figure businesses and coached over 1,000 entrepreneurs. I’ll share my direct experience, and what has worked for me and my clients.
18+ hours of comprehensive training: From SEO and social media to offline marketing and getting media coverage, you’ll learn every strategy needed to transform your marketing.
Personalized support: I respond to 99% of student questions within 24 hours because I care about your success. You’re not just taking a course—you’re gaining a dedicated mentor.


Ready to take control of your marketing and drive the growth you've been dreaming of? Enroll now and start your journey to success!


LATEST COURSE UPDATE:


Extra focus on SEO and winning with best long-tail keyword research
Case studies of different companies & how they reached 1,000,000 users
How to make cornerstone SEO pages that rank
Write better headlines that increase click-through rates
Full section on how to promote Amazon/Kindle books and become a best seller
Growth hacking SEO strategies to make almost any page rank in top-10
Case studies of my own websites with traffic growth
Interview-based case study of how one client got millions of website visitors from Internet marketing
Tools and plugins to help you implement your online marketing strategies like the Weglot translation plugin which helps your SEO in other languages and immediately helps you rank for additional keywords
* JOIN OVER 18,000 DELIGHTED STUDENTS WHO HAVE TAKEN THIS ONLINE MARKETING COURSE


WHAT MAKES THIS INTERNET MARKETING COURSE EFFECTIVE


This course combines SEO and social media to maximize the results of each in a savvy way.
First, you will implement modern SEO for your blog, eCommerce, or a business website. SEO will set you up for boundless long-term potential while also getting you early results.
After implementing SEO, you will focus on social media marketing to help your business. Social media marketing will help you grow awareness, branding, drive traffic, and make sales. In addition to the direct traffic and sales you'll get from social media marketing, it will also boost your website's SEO, helping you get more traffic from Google search.
As a result, the traffic you get from SEO will help your social media grow faster, and vice versa. This will create exponential growth for your business, and have a snowball effect of growth!


THIS COURSE CAN HELP YOU WITH GROWTH HACKING


Before you identify which marketing strategy is the most effective for growing your business, you must experiment with different marketing tactics. That process of experimentation is called growth hacking. It is the process by which you discover the best strategies that will work for your unique situation.
Growth hacking is essential in the early stages of start-up marketing when you don't yet know which marketing strategy will be best for your business.
Since you'll have a wide variety of marketing strategies in this course, you'll be able to try many combinations of marketing strategies so you can find an ideal marketing strategy for your unique business.


PRACTICAL AND EFFECTIVE ONLINE MARKETING STRATEGIES


All advice in this course comes from direct experience in my own business, and Internet marketing work I've done for my clients. I know the ins and outs of every marketing strategy I teach because I've done these marketing strategies and they worked.


FIND A MARKETING STRATEGY THAT'S PERFECT FOR YOUR UNIQUE SITUATION


With this course, you'll find the absolute best and most effective marketing strategy for your unique business, so you don't waste time pursuing secondary marketing strategies. This will help you put 100% of your best effort into the most effective marketing strategies.


WHAT KIND OF TRAFFIC CAN YOU EXPECT?


While no one can predict the future or promise specific results, the strategies in this course have worked extremely well for me. I've reached millions of people online in a variety of ways on many platforms because I combine social media and SEO, and get the most out of each strategy like I'll show you in this course.
The strategies in this course also work for hundreds of my clients, many of whom have found tremendous growth online.


INSTRUCTOR BACKGROUND


I've been an entrepreneur for 20 years, have personally coached over 1,000 entrepreneurs, taught 850,000 students online, and helped millions of entrepreneurs worldwide, some of whom created 6 and 7-figure businesses, and I can help you too.
I am an expert marketer, and I create winning marketing strategies for my clients on a daily basis. Now it is your turn to benefit from my Internet marketing strategies to grow your business and fulfill your dreams.
I am most fulfilled from my work when my clients grow their businesses. I made this course to help business owners grow their companies to tremendous heights.


AMAZING VALUE: OVER 18 HOURS OF VIDEO AND OVER 200 LECTURES


This online marketing course is comprehensive. It will make you a great marketer in a short amount of time. You will learn top social media marketing strategies, SEO (search engine optimization), how to get publicity for your business, effective offline marketing strategies, and everything in-between.
After you complete the course, you will have a well-rounded understanding of all marketing strategies, and most importantly you will be able to choose and correctly implement the most effective strategies to grow your business.


GET A CAREER BOOST WITH A CERTIFICATE OF COMPLETION


After completing 100% of this marketing strategy course, you will be emailed a certificate of completion. You can show it as proof of your expertise in SEO and social media, and that you have completed a certain number of hours of instruction on marketing strategies.
If you want to get a marketing job or freelancing clients, a certificate from this course can help you appear as a stronger candidate for marketing jobs.


MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE


This SEO and social media marketing strategy course comes with a Udemy-backed, 30-day money-back guarantee. This is not just a guarantee, it's my personal promise to you that I will go out of my way to help you succeed just like I've done for thousands of my other students.


Invest in your future. Enroll now and start growing your business.

Module 1: Introduction to TikTok

Module 6: Engaging with the TikTok Community

Module 7: Promotion and Cross-Platform Integration

By the end of this course, you will have a comprehensive understanding of TikTok's platform, its algorithm, and the strategies required to increase your follower count and maximize your TikTok success. Armed with the knowledge and techniques learned throughout the program, you will be well-equipped to create compelling content, engage with your audience, and grow your TikTok account faster than ever before.

courses.description:
为什么要学这门课？


通晓产品+运营的复合型人才，是未来市场的刚需


随着越来越多的企业进行数字化转型，单一岗位很难适应市场需求，复合人才是未来市场的刚需。
产品和运营是互联网行业最广泛的两个岗位，单一的产品经理如何如何，单一的运营又如何如何，而产品运营就是顺应需求之下而诞生的复合型岗位。


然而很多从业者对产品运营的定义都不清晰，对岗位的发展前景和职业规划感到迷茫；各种工作都有涉及，但缺乏系统的工作方法；要为业务指标负责，需要思考运营策略如何制定，但却不知道该从何下手……

为此，我们开发了本课程，帮助所有想要成为产品运营或者正在产品运营岗位上的人，能够掌握一套系统的方法论，成为通晓产品+运营的复合型人才。


课程导师 - 静秋
《产品运营新物种》作者 / 造物者科技创始人/前阿里巴巴西南区运营负责人
10年互联网行业经验，造物者科技创始人，成都新经济发展研究院合作专家，曾任阿里巴巴西南区运营负责人，携程旗下途风运营副总裁，百度技术副总裁助理，高级产品经理，以联想营销创意大赛全国第一名的成绩进入运营圈，手握技术、产品、运营三项专利。
target_audience: 产品运营从业者：掌握产品运营的系统工作方法
运营/增长团队的负责人：学会如何高效寻找业务突破点，制定高增长运营规划
想转岗的运营人：理解产品运营的职责和工作逻辑

requirements: Usuario de Internet
courses.description:
"Hasta ahora los conceptos y las explicaciones están muy claras y es muy fácil seguir el desarrollo." --Jesús

"Excelente curso, las explicaciones son claras y con muchos ejemplos para practicar." --Andrés


¿Por qué te puedo enseñar sobre esto?
Profesor desde 2010.
Ingeniero Técnico en Informática.
Máster en Formación del Profesorado especialidad en Informática.
Freelance desde hace varios años, en los que he entregado proyectos SEO a gran cantidad de clientes satisfechos.
También soy un poco nómada, he impartido cursos de SEO en gran cantidad de centros de formación y en diversos lugares de España como Gran Canaria, El Hierro, Valdepeñas, Ciudad Real o Madrid.
"Mantengo lo que dije al principio. estoy aprendiendo muchísimo, lo entiendo practicamente todo, y eso que de informática no tengo ni idea, motivo por el que reitero, que haces fácil lo que para mí era difícil. Has facilitado mucha información sobre herramientas, gratuitas y de pago, y eso lo valoro muchísimo, pero además, has entrado en prácticamente todos los casos a explicar con un ejemplo sencillo cómo utilizarlas, y eso, es todavía más de agradecer. De momento, el único problema que veo, es que es muchísima información, que tengo que integrar, y ponerme manos a la obra ya con mi propia web, a aplicar todo lo que has enseñado. Increiblemente completo el apartado de contenidos. PENSABA que sabía algo sobre ello, pero veo, que no tenía ni idea. Entiendo ahora muchas cosas.. De nuevo, mil gracias!" --Bárbara

¿Cómo está estructurado este curso?
Cada capítulo cuenta con una breve y concisa explicación de cada una de las temáticas y puntos que encontrarás en el índice, con ejemplos ilustrativos de temas fáciles de entender que podrás extender al sector en el que te dediques.
Además, hago alusión constante a herramientas y servicios de terceros que podemos utilizar para facilitar la labor. Muchos son gratuitos y otros muchos son de pago.
También Debes tener en cuenta que conviene practicarlo para aprenderlo y comprenderlo bien.
Estaré disponible para cualquier duda que te pueda surgir.
¡No dudes en preguntar!
¿De qué voy a hablar en este curso?
Si nos paramos a pensar, llegamos a la conclusión de que las búsquedas son la puerta de entrada a todo lo que hacemos online.
Por ejemplo, si tenemos hambre, buscamos los mejores restaurantes a nuestro alrededor y leemos opiniones de otros usuarios sobre esos restaurantes. Si estamos en una tienda buscando un producto o servicio, también lo buscamos en Internet.
Si queremos ir al cine, si tenemos una pregunta o duda, si queremos saber el tiempo para la caminata del día siguiente, …
Al cabo de día realizamos una gran cantidad de búsquedas en diversos buscadores como Google o incluso buscadores internos de sitios web como por ejemplo Amazon. Y es que, con la explosión de los dispositivos móviles, como los smartphone (teléfonos inteligentes) y tabletas, no estamos limitados al lugar desde donde buscamos, así que estamos buscando todos los días y en cada momento. Pero la pregunta es, ¿nos encontrarán a nosotros en los resultados de búsqueda?
Lo primero que debemos saber es cómo funcionan estos buscadores que utilizamos y para ello nos vamos a centrar en Google, simplemente por ser hoy por hoy el buscador más utilizado, tanto a nivel global como en los países hispanohablantes.
También podrás usar las técnicas de este curso para posicionar tus productos en Amazon, tu perfil en LinkedIn o tu currículo en un portal de empleo.

courses.bio: Master the skill of creating simple, safe, supportive communities for your audience outside of social media
objectives: Why having an off-social-media space is a game-changer for audience growth and business success

requirements: You must be willing to take action on what you learn in this course and keep an open mind and heart for new ideas and strategies
courses.description:
Relying solely on social media to grow your audience and business? It’s time to rethink that strategy.
Social media platforms are noisy, unpredictable, and constantly changing. If you want to build deeper relationships with your audience, create a safe and engaging space for them, and have full control over your community without the stress of algorithms, then this course is for you.
In this training, you’ll learn:
- Why having an off-social-media space is a game-changer for audience growth and business success
- How to create a gamified, engaging, and thriving community in less than two hours step by step
- How to structure your community for high engagement and long-term growth

courses.description:
If you’ve ever started a YouTube channel, you know how painfully slow it can be to get people to actually watch your videos.


You put in the time, the effort, maybe even some solid editing—and yet, your views barely crack 100. Maybe a few videos pick up a little more traction, but overall, growth feels like watching paint dry.


It’s frustrating...


But here’s the good news: You don’t have to wait years for your channel to take off.


In fact, some of the biggest YouTubers gained massive followings within just six months of starting.


That’s insanely fast. And no, they didn’t just “get lucky” or have some unfair advantage. They followed a process—one that works.


The kind of process that takes the guesswork out of YouTube growth and replaces it with actual strategy.


Now, I won’t sugarcoat it—there are no magic formulas, and success on YouTube isn’t guaranteed. But what I can tell you is that the methods in this course are proven.


They’re the same methods used by creators who have gone from struggling for views to building channels that consistently bring in traffic, engagement, and even revenue.


And the best part?


You don’t need a massive budget to make this work.


This course was designed specifically with a low-to-no budget in mind, so whether you have fancy equipment or you’re just working with your phone and free editing software, you’ll have actionable steps that actually move the needle.


Think about it—where do you want to be six months from now? Still struggling to get a handful of views, or actively growing a channel that’s gaining momentum?


If you’re serious about making progress, now’s the time to take action.


Enroll today and start building a channel that actually gets seen.
target_audience: Anyone who is wanting to learn how they can grow their YouTube channel overtime with 100% proven methods!

courses.title: From Invisible to Invincible: Explosive Brand Growth Mystery
courses.bio: استراتيجيات تسويقية لمبيعات مليونية
objectives: فهم كيف تجعل العملاء ينجذبون إلى علامتك التجارية دون الحاجة إلى الإعلانات المدفوعة فقط
كيفية تحويل علامتك التجارية إلى مغناطيس يجذب العملاء من خلال السرد القصصي والتفاعل العاطفي

تعلم كيفية استخدام الإلحاح، التلعيب (Gamification)، وإبراز القيمة بدلاً من تخفيض الأسعار باستمرار

courses.description:
في عالم تزدحم فيه الأسواق بالمنتجات والعروض المتشابهة، لم يعد التحدي في مجرد بيع منتج جيد، بل في خلق تجربة تجعل العملاء ينجذبون إليك دون تفكير. المبيعات الضخمة لا تأتي من الصدفة، ولا تعتمد فقط على الإعلانات المدفوعة، بل تنبع من استراتيجيات تسويقية مدروسة تجعل العملاء يشعرون بأنهم جزء من علامتك التجارية، وليس مجرد مشترين عابرين.


لكن كيف تصل إلى هذه المرحلة؟ لماذا هناك علامات تجارية تحقق مبيعات مليونية بينما تكافح أخرى للبقاء؟ الأمر لا يتعلق فقط بالجودة، بل بكيفية تقديم المنتج، ببناء قصة تلامس مشاعر العملاء، وبتحفيزهم على الشراء دون أن يشعروا بأنهم يُجبرون عليه.


هذا الكورس هو دليلك العملي لفهم اللعبة الحقيقية للتسويق، حيث لا تبيع منتجًا فحسب، بل تخلق ولاءً طويل الأمد يدفع العملاء للعودة مرة بعد أخرى، والتوصية بك للآخرين دون أن تطلب ذلك منهم.


كيف تجعل علامتك التجارية مغناطيسًا يجذب العملاء؟
في عالم السوشيال ميديا، لا يكفي أن يكون لديك منتج جيد، بل يجب أن تكون لديك قصة تجذب الناس إليك. العلامات التجارية التي تحقق مبيعات مليونية لا تعتمد فقط على الإعلانات، بل تبني مجتمعات رقمية حول منتجاتها. فهي تعرف أن التفاعل مع الجمهور لا يقتصر على نشر المحتوى، بل يمتد إلى بناء علاقات حقيقية تجعل العملاء يشعرون بأنهم جزء من الرحلة.


فكّر في العلامات التجارية التي تحبها، لماذا تنجذب إليها؟ هل هو مجرد المنتج، أم أنك تشعر أنها تمثلك بطريقة ما؟ هل سبق لك أن وجدت نفسك تتحدث عن منتج أو خدمة وكأنك تعمل لصالحها؟ هذا هو سحر التفاعل المجتمعي، عندما يتحول العملاء إلى سفراء للعلامة التجارية دون الحاجة إلى حملات إعلانية مكلفة.


في هذا الكورس، ستتعلم كيف تبني هذا الولاء، كيف تصمم محتوى يخلق تفاعلًا حقيقيًا، وكيف تجعل العملاء يشاركون قصصهم وتجاربهم مع علامتك التجارية دون أن تطلب ذلك منهم.


كيف تصبح علامتك التجارية جزءًا من محادثات العملاء اليومية؟
بعض العلامات التجارية تُعرف بمجرد رؤية لون معين أو سماع عبارة قصيرة. البعض الآخر يخلق موجات من التفاعل بمجرد نشر تعليق ذكي على السوشيال ميديا. السر ليس في الصدفة، بل في فهم كيفية استغلال منصات التواصل لصالحك. الشركات الناجحة لا تنتظر أن يأتيها العملاء، بل تتفاعل معهم بطرق إبداعية، تستغل التريندات، وتخلق محتوى يجعل الناس يتحدثون عنها.


هل سبق لك أن شاهدت ميمًا مضحكًا يحمل اسم علامة تجارية، أو منشورًا انتشر كالنار في الهشيم بسبب تعليق ساخر أو رد غير متوقع؟ هذا ليس مجرد حظ، بل استراتيجيات مدروسة تعتمد على فهم طبيعة الجمهور، واستغلال اللحظات المناسبة لجذب الانتباه.


في هذا الكورس، لن تتعلم فقط كيف تروج لمنتجك، بل كيف تجعل جمهورك يروج لك بطريقة طبيعية. ستكتشف كيف تجعل علامتك التجارية جزءًا من المحادثات اليومية، وكيف تحوّل المتابعين إلى عملاء مخلصين من خلال استراتيجيات التفاعل الذكي، المحتوى الترفيهي، واستخدام السرد القصصي لجذب الانتباه وبناء الثقة.


كيف تحول العملاء المحتملين إلى مشترين دون الحاجة إلى تخفيضات مستمرة؟
الخطأ الذي تقع فيه الكثير من الشركات هو أنها تعتقد أن الطريقة الوحيدة لزيادة المبيعات هي تقديم العروض والتخفيضات. لكن الحقيقة أن العملاء لا يبحثون دائمًا عن السعر الأرخص، بل عن القيمة التي يحصلون عليها مقابل أموالهم.


لماذا يشتري الناس منتجات باهظة الثمن في حين أن هناك بدائل أرخص متاحة؟ لماذا يشعر البعض بأنهم مضطرون لشراء منتج معين بمجرد رؤيته، حتى لو لم يكونوا بحاجة إليه في تلك اللحظة؟ الجواب يكمن في كيفية تقديم المنتج، في الرسائل التسويقية التي تحفّز العملاء على اتخاذ القرار، وفي خلق إحساس بالإلحاح يجعل العميل يشعر أنه إذا لم يتخذ قراره الآن، فسيفوّت فرصة لا تتكرر.


في هذا الكورس، ستتعلم كيف تبني رسائل تسويقية تدفع العملاء لاتخاذ القرار فورًا، كيف تستخدم التلعيب (Gamification) لزيادة التفاعل، وكيف تصمم عروضًا تسويقية لا تعتمد فقط على الخصومات، بل على خلق شعور بالقيمة والاستثنائية.


لماذا بعض العلامات التجارية تنمو بسرعة بينما تبقى أخرى عالقة في نفس المكان؟
في عالم الأعمال، لا يكفي أن تمتلك منتجًا رائعًا، بل يجب أن تعرف كيف تضعه في المكان المناسب، أمام الجمهور المناسب، بالرسالة المناسبة. الشركات التي تحقق مبيعات مليونية لا تعتمد على منتج واحد فقط، بل تبني استراتيجيات نمو ذكية تجعل العملاء يعودون مرة بعد أخرى.


أحد أسرار هذا النجاح هو التسويق التعاوني – عندما تتعاون علامتان تجاريتان للوصول إلى جمهور جديد بطريقة طبيعية. هناك أيضًا استراتيجيات النمو السريع، مثل التسويق عبر المؤثرين بطريقة مدروسة، وليس فقط عبر اختيار أي شخص لديه عدد متابعين كبير.


ستتعلم في هذا الكورس كيف تختار الشراكات الصحيحة، كيف تستخدم قوة التأثير الاجتماعي لصالحك، وكيف تصمم حملات تسويقية ذكية لا تعتمد فقط على الميزانيات الإعلانية الضخمة، بل على فهم سيكولوجية العميل ودوافعه الحقيقية للشراء.


لماذا هذا الكورس مختلف عن أي كورس آخر؟
الفرق بين الشركات التي تحقق مبيعات مليونية وتلك التي تكافح للنجاح ليس في المنتج، بل في الاستراتيجيات التي تستخدمها. هذا الكورس لا يقدم لك مجرد نظريات، بل أدوات وخطط قابلة للتطبيق فورًا على مشروعك.


ستتعلم من خلال أمثلة حقيقية، دراسات حالة، وتمارين عملية تساعدك على بناء استراتيجيتك الخاصة خطوة بخطوة. ستخرج من هذا الكورس ليس فقط بفهم أعمق للتسويق، بل بخطة واضحة تساعدك على تحقيق نمو حقيقي ومستدام.


هل هذا الكورس لك؟
إذا كنت رائد أعمال، مسوقًا رقميًا، صانع محتوى، أو مدير مبيعات وتسعى لفهم كيف تحقق مبيعات ضخمة دون الحاجة إلى إنفاق ميزانيات ضخمة على الإعلانات، فهذا الكورس مصمم خصيصًا لك.


هل أنت جاهز لتحقيق مبيعات مليونية؟
target_audience: رواد الأعمال: الذين يسعون لبناء علامات تجارية قوية وزيادة المبيعات دون الاعتماد فقط على الإعلانات المدفوعة
المسوقون الرقميون: الذين يرغبون في تطوير مهاراتهم التسويقية باستخدام استراتيجيات غير تقليدية
أصحاب المشاريع الناشئة: الذين يريدون تحقيق نمو سريع بميزانيات محدودة
مديرو المبيعات: الذين يحتاجون إلى فهم أعمق لاستراتيجيات التسويق التي تحفز العملاء على الشراء
صنّاع المحتوى: الذين يرغبون في بناء مجتمعات رقمية قوية والتفاعل مع جمهورهم بطرق أكثر تأثيرًا
المهتمون بالتسويق عبر السوشيال ميديا: الذين يريدون تعلم كيفية استغلال التريندات، التفاعل مع الجمهور، وتحويل المتابعين إلى عملاء فعليين
أي شخص يريد تحقيق مبيعات ضخمة: دون الحاجة إلى الاعتماد على التخفيضات المستمرة أو الميزانيات الإعلانية المرتفعة

courses.description:
Are you ready to turn your passion into a thriving YouTube channel? This course provides everything you need to start, grow, and monetize your YouTube presence effectively. Whether you're a complete beginner or looking to take your channel to the next level, this step-by-step guide covers all the essentials.


Meet Your Instructor:
Hi, I’m Noman, a YouTuber with over 385,000 combined subscribers across my two successful channels: a gaming channel with 215K subscribers and a commentary/vlog channel, Nomi, with 170K subscribers. I’ve grown my audience by understanding YouTube algorithms, creating engaging content, and mastering monetization strategies. Now, I’m here to share my proven methods and help you achieve your YouTube goals.


What You’ll Learn:
YouTube Basics: Learn how to set up and optimize your channel for maximum growth.
Finding Your Niche: Discover how to select the right niche and create content that resonates with your target audience.
Content Creation: Master brainstorming, scripting, and creating engaging videos tailored to your viewers.
Video Production: Get insights into budget-friendly equipment, lighting, audio setup, and recording techniques.
YouTube SEO: Learn how to craft effective titles, descriptions, and tags to rank higher and attract more viewers.
Monetization Strategies: Understand YouTube's monetization policies and how to earn through ads, affiliate marketing, personal brand and sponsorships.
Leveraging Social Media: Discover how platforms like Instagram, TikTok, Linkedin, Facebook and Twitter can amplify your YouTube success.


Why This Course?
Practical, actionable steps with real-life examples from a successful YouTuber.
Clear guidance for beginners and tips to overcome common challenges.
Insights into YouTube algorithms, content strategies, and earning potential.


Who Is This Course For?
Aspiring creators who want to launch their YouTube journey.
Existing YouTubers looking to grow their audience and monetize their content.
Entrepreneurs and marketers seeking to leverage YouTube for brand growth.
By the end of this course, you’ll have the knowledge and tools to create professional-quality videos, build an engaged audience, and generate revenue through YouTube. Learn from my personal experience and take the first step toward your YouTube success today!
target_audience: Beginner and Intermediate Content Creators who want to make big on YouTube
Anyone who wants to start making content on youtube

courses.description:
Acquiring customers is the hardest thing a business has to do. Statistically, 80% of businesses fail not because of money or founder conflict, but simply because they couldn't reach a traction point.
Most people aimlessly try different growth strategies and ideas without an actual framework behind them. They head over to networking events, spin up a few ads, try to write a few cold emails and give up. This can be absolutely debilitating and demotivating.
So how do the best of the best do it?
They use a combination of proven, science-backed strategies to bring in consistent and predictable growth for their business.
In this course, I'll be opening the doors to the exact systems I have used to scale over 54 different businesses, 1 agency (7 figures) and 2 startups in the past 4 years (1 multi-six figure exit).
Our portfolio of clients bring in of 8 figures in revenue each month and have raised more than 9 figures in funding (combined)
You'll be learning tactics that have been used by the worlds best marketers and lead generation experts to flood your pipeline with leads.


You will learn how to create a cold email process that can get your dream customer to jump on a call with you.
You'll understand how to change your product/service to engineer it for growth.
You will be able to master inbound marketing using content marketing and SEO.


What exactly is included in this course?
How to dominate outbound cold emailing to close enterprise deals like clockwork
What systems to use when creating an outbound process
How to engineer your product for growth
Processes to persuade your existing customers to share your product like wildfire
How to use performance ads in 2021
Coming up with unique pricing models to acquire new customers
Leveraging online communities to acquire 1000s of leads
Step by step process to building a thriving online Facebook group to acquire leads
Building an inbound lead machine with systemised content marketing and SEO
Ways to acquire high converting lead using content growth
Ways to repurpose your blogs to create 100s of different content pieces from one blog


Here's the truth, most people fail at growth and cold emailing.


However using the strategies I've crafted for you, you will join the small subset of hyper-successful sales experts that can consistently acquire customers and close deals.


What I'm sharing is a culmination of 1000s of hours of research and experimentation distilled into the perfect combination of tactics you can use in your arsenal.


I'm not just giving top-level advice, but rather going deep into the exact steps you need to take to get a massive return of investment.


So if you're ready to take on more customers, and build a generational business click that "buy now" button and get ready to experience your most profitable 1.5 hours.
target_audience: Marketers and Growth Managers
Cold emailers, Sales Development Representatives and Business Development Reps
Founders and Executives
SaaS and eCommerce growth leaders

If you are a course creator or a digital creator such as an online coach, or an online trainer, then automation is something that's going to help you save a lot of time and increase sales without much effort.


This beginner-friendly course is here to help you understand some of the areas where you need to automate processes for smoother operations and better results.

By the end of the course, you’ll have a fair understanding of the core principles of automation when it comes to selling courses. Whether you’re looking to attract more students, streamline your communications, or manage your sales more effectively, this course will set you on the right path.


Take your first step toward simplifying your course-selling journey with automation!

Por onde começar a verdadeira Prospecção de Clientes?


Prospectar clientes é, provavelmente, o desafio mais presente no ambiente empresarial nos dias de hoje. Contudo, muito se pratica e pouco se planeja. Com as diversas ofertas virtuais de exposição e captação de clientes por meio de redes, filtragens e impulsionamentos, os negócios contemporâneos acabam por transferir para as plataformas digitais a responsabilidade pelo pensamento de seus próprios empreendimentos, o que é um risco muito grande.


Este curso se apresenta como uma metodologia que empodera as organizações quanto ao pensamento técnico e formal das prospecções e de suas bases de clientes. Prospectar novos clientes não é uma missão muito difícil, porém conquistá-los de forma sustentável, segura e qualitativa é um grande desafio que não pode ser terceirizado para quaisquer promessas sem o domínio total dos gestores do negócio. Devemos, portanto, aplicar técnicas e tomar as rédeas de nossas ações de prospecção .


Devemos, portanto, aplicar técnicas e tomar as rédeas de nossas ações de prospecção de clientes. Curso inclui material previamente estruturado para construção do plano de prospecção.


Nossos passos:
-Boas-Vindas
-Nivelamento Técnico
-Fluxo do Pensamento Mercadológico
-Passo a passo da Metodologia
-Estratégias de Mercado
-Transformando tudo em Plano de Ação


Para Consultores (ativos ou em formação):
. Trabalhe com métodos efetivos, gestão e controle. Prospectar é uma atividade dinâmica e a cada dia novas alternativas surgem no mercado. Com esta metodologia você terá em mãos uma sequência mercadológica racional e previamente estruturada;


Para Gestores e Empresários:
. Comprar listas de e-mails, seguidores de redes sociais ou assinaturas eletrônicas que prometem network e clientes efetivos são ações desesperadas e totalmente desaconselhadas. Mesmo sendo muito dinâmico, o mercado possui uma lógica que integra nossos negócios com os clientes em potencial. Profissionalize sua prospecção.
target_audience: Empresas de pequeno e médio porte.
Consultores empresariais.
Acadêmicos em fase final de graduação.
Profissionais que queiram ingressar no promissor e rentável mundo da consultoria empresarial.

requirements: Willingness to be Awesome
courses.description:
NEED TO GROW YOUR STARTUP?
Learn what Dropbox, Twitter, Expedia & other successful startups do to acquire millions of users. Early in a startup you need one thing. Growth.
A growth hacker is not a replacement for a marketer. A growth hacker is not better than marketer. A growth hacker is just different than a marketer. To use the most succinct definition, “a growth hacker is a person whose true north is growth.“
Episodes are led by growth hackers from Facebook, Dropbox, LinkedIn, & Expedia among many, and used at over 30 accelerators like Y Combinator, 500 Startups, & TechStars.
LEARN FROM 13 GROWTH HACKER TV EXCLUSIVES - HUSTLERS DON'T WATCH CABLE
If you are interested in learning more about growth hacking, becoming a growth hacker, or just growing your startup, then welcome to Growth Hacker TV. To begin, we recommend watching our episodes with the experts below:
1) Steve Blank (Startup Legend)
Steve Blank is a legend in the startup ecosystem. His online course on entrepreneurship has over 100,000 students, and in this interview he teaches us how to use customer development to make customer acquisition easier.
2) Neil Patel (KISS Metrics, Quicksprout)
Neil Patel is the co-founder of KISSmetrics, an analytics provider that helps companies make better business decisions. He is also the co-founder of CrazyEgg, and writes a popular blog at Quick Sprout.
3) Archie Abrams (Growth, Udemy)
Archie is the Director of Growth at Udemy, and he is an expert at data analysis, PPC, SEO, viral acquisition, email marketing, A/B testing, and copywriting.
4) Dan Martell (Clarity)
Dan is an investor. a serial entrepreneur, and the founder of Clarity, a startup that allows you to connect with experts so that you can make faster and better decisions to grow your business. Dan is an expert on product growth hacking.
5) Rob Walling (Hittail, SoftwarebyRob)
Rob has been building web applications professionally for 12 years, and has worked as a consultant, a freelance developer, the development manager for the City of Pasadena, and a team lead for the world’s largest prepaid credit card company. Rob lives and works
6) Gabe Zichermann (Gamification)
Gabe is the author of numerous books, a public speaker, a startup mentor, and a conference organizer, and each of these roles stem from his passion for gamification. He is recognized as a pioneer in the gamification industry.
TESTIMONIALS (aka THIS STUFF WORKS)
We’ve also received countless tweets and emails from our users, telling us what they think of Growth Hacker TV:
“Growth Hacker + TV = Hell Yeah” Shane Barker
“This is how to do a publishing company in 2013: Growth Hacker TV” Dylan Hassinger
“The future of TV is this: Growth Hacker TV “ James Deer
LOOK INSIDE THE CONTENT
The fact with Growth is that not all methods will work for every startup. Growth Hacker TV will help you find the approaches that will work for your startup.
If you want to see some examples of the different disciplines that are involved in growth, we have broken them down for you to preview:
7) Sean Ellis (Qualaroo, first marketer at Dropbox)
Sean actually coined the term "Growth Hacker" and he has led marketing at multiple companies that have had an IPO. In this episode we talk about his new company, Qualaroo, and we find out what he's learned about growth through all of his experiences.
- On Product / Market Fit

- Scaling Growth

- Free, Paid and Disruptive
- Best Advice to any startup
8) Aaron Ginn, (Growth, StumbleUpon)
Aaron applies his study of people and metaphysics to marketing, product development, and entrepreneurship. His approach is product driven, data inspired, and cross-disciplinary (philosophy and behavioral economics).
- How Growth Hacking came to be?

9) Mike Volpe, (CMO, Hubspot)
Mike was the 5th employee at HubSpot (which now has over 500 employees) and he currently serves as the CMO. Mike is an expert on inbound marketing, and he has built a scalable, inbound lead generation machine for HubSpot.
- Hubspot’s Growth from 10 to 8,500

- The Best Advice for Startups
10) Conrad Wadowski, (Partner, GrowHack)
Conrad is a partner at the world's first growth hacking agency. In this episode he gives us a clear view of the lean marketing funnel that he uses, and he teaches us the highlights from his course on customer acquisition.
- What is a Growth Agency?

11) Georgiana Laudi (Director of Marketing, Unbounce)
Georgiana is the Director of Marketing at Unbounce, which helps you build, publish & A/B test landing pages without I.T. so that you can Increase the ROI of your marketing campaigns.

In summary, this course is designed to help you grow your Instagram account and increase engagement with your audience. courses.description:
B端即To Business，面向企业端。
B端产品的运营对象主要划分为三类，有决策权的客户、管理员客户、业务客户。B端运营本质是要为企业盈利服务。当下C端互联网产品的市场已经逐渐饱和，而在B端，也就是企业服务方面，还有着很多可能性。以往的B端运营误认为驱动业务增长的唯一解就是销售，但这样野路子的观念已经无法适应行业的变化。现在很多B端运营人都面临着这样的困境：可选择的渠道较为单一，不知道怎样能用低成本获取有效线索&高质量精准客户；老用户续费意愿不够强，流失严重，复购率很低，不知道如何去做用户维系和召回。
为此我们顺行需求，开发了本课程，该课程通过系统讲解从「线索获取」到「客户成功」整个To B 运营的流程，掌握toB产品获客以及续费的核心关键要素，最终帮助学员掌握低成本获客可复制的实操方法
target_audience: 1-3岁B端运营：有一定经验的B端运营，面临获客难、转化率低的难题，工作拘泥于执行岗，缺乏全面理解
1年以上C端转行B端：对B端运营缺乏系统认知和理解，以往C端的经验在B端失灵，急需补齐B端业务认知
1年以上C端转行B端：对B端运营缺乏系统认知和理解，以往C端的经验在B端失灵，急需补齐B端业务认知

Artificial intelligence (AI) is reshaping the way businesses approach marketing. To remain competitive and achieve long-term success, it's imperative for marketers to stay informed about the latest AI trends and adapt their strategies accordingly.

Enfin, nous aborderons les différentes techniques de growth hacking et vous donnerons des astuces pour accélérer la croissance de votre entreprise.
Parmi les différentes thématiques abordées, vous découvrirez les fondamentaux du marketing digital, comme la stratégie de contenu, les réseaux sociaux, le marketing de l'influence et le marketing des moteurs de recherche. Nous espérons que cette formation sera bénéfique pour votre entreprise et vous aidera à atteindre vos objectifs de croissance. N'hésitez pas à nous contacter si vous avez des questions ou des préoccupations.

Welcome to my course, "YouTube 2023: A Beginner's Complete Guide to YouTube Success"! If you're new to YouTube or struggling to grow your channel, you're in the right place. This course is perfect for beginners, but it's also great for more experienced YouTubers who want to take their channels to the next level. By the end of the course, you'll have all the skills and knowledge you need to succeed on YouTube in 2023 and beyond.

In the rapidly evolving landscape of modern business, where innovation and adaptability are key, the Growth Hacking Professional Certification has emerged as a vital cornerstone for both experts seeking to propel their careers and companies aiming to achieve unprecedented growth. This certification not only validates the expertise of individuals in employing growth hacking strategies but also equips them with the essential knowledge to revolutionize business growth in today's competitive world.


Empowering Experts for Career Advancement
For professionals looking to stand out in a crowded job market, the Growth Hacking Professional Certification offers a distinct advantage. This certification acknowledges their mastery of unconventional yet highly effective methodologies that drive exponential growth. In the dynamic realm of growth hacking, where traditional marketing approaches often fall short, certified experts gain the capacity to experiment with innovative techniques, harness data-driven insights, and pivot strategies seamlessly. This skillset not only makes them valuable assets to companies seeking innovative growth solutions but also paves the way for higher remuneration, enhanced job prospects, and greater career satisfaction.


Certified growth hacking professionals possess an in-depth understanding of concepts such as A/B testing, viral loops, conversion funnels, customer segmentation, and the AARRR framework. Armed with this knowledge, they become adept at identifying growth opportunities, optimizing customer acquisition and retention strategies, and driving long-term business success. Their expertise bridges the gap between creativity and data, enabling them to craft ingenious solutions that resonate with the ever-changing consumer landscape.


Catalyzing Company Growth through Certified Expertise
For companies, the significance of the Growth Hacking Professional Certification cannot be overstated. In a global marketplace defined by rapid innovation and fierce competition, growth hacking has emerged as a game-changing approach. Companies leveraging these strategies often experience accelerated growth rates, expanded market reach, and enhanced customer engagement.


A team of certified growth hacking experts can transform a company's growth trajectory. By continuously experimenting, analyzing, and optimizing strategies, they can uncover hidden opportunities, reduce customer churn, and maximize customer lifetime value. This expertise empowers companies to make data-driven decisions, streamline marketing efforts, and allocate resources more efficiently.


Furthermore, the certified professionals bring fresh perspectives and out-of-the-box thinking to the table. Their ability to identify untapped markets, optimize conversion rates, and devise efficient customer acquisition methods can rejuvenate brands, ensuring their relevance in a rapidly changing business environment. The certification also emphasizes the importance of user-centric design and personalized experiences, leading to improved customer satisfaction and loyalty.


Building a Lucrative Career Path
In the digital age, where industries are disrupted at a remarkable pace, a deep understanding of growth hacking is a sought-after skill that can shape a promising career trajectory. Professionals with a Growth Hacking Professional Certification become catalysts for innovation, able to drive growth even in the most challenging circumstances.


The certification opens doors to various roles, such as Growth Marketers, Product Managers, Digital Strategists, and Startup Founders. The fusion of creativity and data-driven decision-making sets certified individuals apart, making them invaluable assets for companies across industries. As businesses increasingly prioritize growth and agility, those equipped with growth hacking expertise find themselves at the forefront of driving change and success.


In a world driven by innovation, the Growth Hacking Professional Certification has emerged as a beacon of expertise, illuminating paths to career advancement for professionals and transformative growth for companies. By embracing unconventional strategies, data-driven insights, and innovative approaches, individuals can rise to the top of their fields, while businesses can unlock untapped potential and cement their position as market leaders. In the ever-changing landscape of business, growth hacking expertise is a powerful tool that propels both individuals and companies toward unparalleled success.

在“人人都是低头族，整天刷朋友圈刷微博”的时代，有钱任性也不好使了，品牌营销到底该怎么做？

courses.description:
很多想做私域的品牌从一开始都陷入了一个误区：把私域当做一个新的销售渠道，因此，私域池子刚建起来就迫不及待的往里面抛产品，抛链接，轰炸式刷群营销，希望带来转化，然而结果却是不到三个月私域池子快速崩盘。

品牌做私域都是为了实现变现，这个目的毋庸置疑，但这种盲目抛链接的做法和逻辑却与做私域的性质相背离。而实际上，对于私域运营而言，有一个很重要的目的，就是要不断提升流量池里用户的价值。把你的粉丝牢牢圈住，并对品牌产品情感关联或利益关联，才能算得上是真正的私域。

而会员运营，可以说是私域营销中非常关键的一个内容，甚至可以说是核心。那私域流量中的会员运营具体应该怎么做呢？

为此我们邀请到梧叶老师，一位有着8年零售行业用户运营经验的高级用户运营经理，为大家带来“私域会员体系的机制设计”的主题分享。

本课程围绕会员体系的重要性，会员模式的介绍，以及从0-1搭建等级会员体系的实操方法展开，课程详细介绍了新零售私域会员体系的权益设计、积分设计的方法，并通过数据分析，实现私域会员的精细化运营。

通过课程的学习，你将了解会员数据化运营的实操流程，掌握业务数据体系的搭建方法，最终配合会员机制与权益，实现业绩增长。
target_audience: 0-3年私域运营职场人：期待了解会员运营整体设计框架和实操经验
个人创业者：期待了解如何从0-1设计会员体系，打造自己的私域流量池
成熟企业客户：结合自身行业，期待了解如何做用户精细化运营

The Problem and Why You Should Take This Course
When I first started my business, I wasted months (and thousands of dollars) on PR that generated lackluster results from infrequent features on TV and in publications. Despite my efforts (and spending), I became very frustrated because:
I was NOT building any real credibility in my industry
I was NOT gaining significant exposure for myself or my business
I was NOT attracting new, high-quality clients
After months of disappointment, I decided to take things into my own hands. The recipe I have developed has gotten countless writings published in major publications, amassing over 20,000,000 readers in the process. I have established myself as a thought leader, a trusted source of knowledge in my industry, and new, high-quality potential clients are waiting for me in my inbox every morning.
I want to make sure nobody else ever has to waste their time or money on PR that doesn't work.
Since launch, How to Get Published in Major Publications has helped hundreds of students around the world get published and generate REAL results.

courses.description:
Embark on a transformative journey with our course that's designed for sales professionals, business owners, realtors, and mortgage agents weary of the grind, this course addresses the quintessential pain points of building a robust sales pipeline.


Do you find cold calling daunting and time-consuming?
Does the thought of manual lead sorting leave you overwhelmed?
Are you struggling to create a sales process that doesn't consume all your valuable time?
If these challenges resonate with you, you're in the ideal place.


My course introduces a hybrid strategy that harmonizes the assertiveness of outbound tactics with the magnetic pull of inbound methods. You'll learn to leverage the powerful combination of Pipedrive and DuxSoup to automate your outreach, allowing you to spend less time on cold calls and more time closing deals. Discover how to craft compelling persona lists on LinkedIn and engage them with tailored messages that speak directly to their needs and interests.
We’ll guide you through setting up intelligent automations in Pipedrive that work while you sleep, nurturing leads, and moving them through your pipeline. With DuxSoup, you'll automate the initial outreach, making sure your presence is felt without the constant clicking and typing.
By implementing our 5-Step Warm Lead Funnel Strategy, you'll learn how to attract leads who are receptive and ready to engage, allowing you to approach potential clients with confidence, backed by the knowledge that they're already interested in what you have to offer.
This course will not only enhance your efficiency but also elevate the quality of your interactions, ensuring that every lead feels personally attended to. Say goodbye to the spray-and-pray approach and hello to targeted, meaningful conversations that are more likely to convert.
Join us to revolutionize your sales process, reduce the dread of cold outreach, and gain back precious hours in your day. Step into a world where your sales pipeline builds itself, and your time is spent on what truly matters—growing your business and enjoying your successes.
target_audience: This course is meticulously designed for a diverse group of professionals who aim to harness the power of LinkedIn for business growth and development. Whether you are a realtor looking to expand your property listings, a mortgage agent aiming to reach potential clients, a sales professional eager to boost your lead conversion, a business owner seeking innovative strategies to scale your company, or a licensed professional in any field striving to establish your expertise and network—this course offers the insights and tools necessary to achieve your objectives.
